name: The Islands of Azure
description:
The Islands of Azure, a short fantasy adventure game made in Bitsy3D with original music by Geordie Cryle @Amaryllis96

Cover image artists - Michael Hendry and Adam Cameron

If you wish to support the project, you can purchase the soundtrack on Bandcamp which includes two bonus tracks: https://geordiecryle.bandcamp.com/album/the-islands-of-azure-original-soundtrack

Thanks for playing!
